comments:
Eclipse 200404281424  CDT 200404281729

After performing a few Searches in the Sanity, I got a class cast exception.

Steps (Repeat steps 3 to 8 a few times) :
1) Extract the BubbleSort project
2) Select the BubbleSort folder in the C/C++ Projects view. 
3) Open the C/C++ Search dialog. 
4) Enter '*' (no quotes) into the Search string field. 
5) Un-check the Any Element checkbox. 
6) Check the Class/Struct checkbox. 
7) Click on the Selected Resources scope. 
8) Execute the search. 

Exception:
